lyrics:
7 contributorspromise english version lyricsverse 1 romeo santos
i been walking the wire over your love
and they fall into your hands
but i dont know where ill land
your body holds me hostage whenever i touch you
im a prisoner inside
baby til the end of time

verse 2 usher
try to keep my balance but i still fall
but howd i fall so hard
right into your arms
wrapped inside you baby and its so warm
love without a cause
leaves me trapped inside my own bars

chorus romeo santos  usher
baby i want you i need you to love me completely
so promise me youll never be anybodys but mine
ill give you my heart girl but you got to promise prométeme mami
promise youll hold me hold me
touch me touch me
love me love me
way past forever

interlude romeo santos  usher
hasta siempre
escucha las palabras de romeo
yeah man
usher baby
romeo
you might also likeverse 3 romeo santos  usher
i know im young and ill give my life for you
and there is nothing that i wouldnt suffer to prove that is true
i try to be calm but my chest keeps pounding
try to swim but its like im drowning
all ive come for is love oh baby

chorus romeo santos  usher
baby i want you i need you to love me completely
so promise me youll never be anybodys but mine
ill give you my heart girl but you got to promise ay prométeme mami
promise youll hold me hold me
touch me touch me
love me love me
way past forever

bridge romeo santos  usher
you need this in your life two kings revolutionary
without you girl i would be barely breathing
i never would survive if you would leave me
but i realize its worth running a race
when the finish line is you

chorus romeo santos  usher
baby i want you i need you pero yo tengo miedo
so promise me youll never be anybodys but mine
if i give you my heart girl but you got to promise
promise that youll love me baby
promise youll hold me hold me
touch me touch me
love me love me
way past forever
outro romeo santos
baby i want you i need you to love me completely
so promise me youll never be anybodys but mine4embed
